chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Guys, we have seen almost everything in HTML.

chunks.text: In today's video, we will conclude HTML

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: and talk about some miscellaneous things

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: which will help you a lot in your web development journey.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: After that, we will start CSS from the coming videos.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I am very excited to conclude HTML.

chunks.text: You guys like this video and write Sigma patch op in the comment section below.

chunks.text: So guys, as you can see, I have come to my computer screen.

chunks.text: And without wasting time, I will create a new folder here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And I will create a file index.html.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now here I have given the file index.html.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now I want to tell you one thing.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: There are many things in HTML that you have to explore yourself.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you some things and after this video, I will conclude HTML.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you want to write in HTML,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I will turn on Word Wrap and toggle Screencast Mode.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Suppose you want to write this in HTML,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: 3 is greater than 4.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Suppose you want to write this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you try to write this in HTML,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I will show you the preview of this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So it came here by writing 3 is greater than 4.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now suppose I write here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: this is the code for paragraph.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And I write something like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now I have written this here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I want it to appear.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But you see here, it will not appear.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Why not?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Because how will it know that I want to write the code for paragraph

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: or I want to use this P tag as a syntax.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So to avoid this thing, HTML entities are there.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now let me tell you what HTML entities are.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you write ampersand lt semicolon here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: lt for less than,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then you can write it as lt semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now if you write ampersand lt semicolon here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: and replace it with ampersand lt semicolon,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: and you replace the greater than with ampersand gt semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I will show you this thing.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you replace it with ampersand gt semicolon,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then what will happen?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: That it will appear here as it is written.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: As you can see, I will zoom in and show you.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So what happens is that HTML entities are used

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: to write those things that might collide with HTML syntax.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: What does it mean to collide?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If we write the code of paragraph tag here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then how will HTML know that this is the code of paragraph tag?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Or if you want to write this thing as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: There is also a pre tag for this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you put anything in the pre tag,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: and you write here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then P, this is a para.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So if you write it like this,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then it will come here as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: It will come as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And along with that,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: if you write new lines here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: this is after few new lines.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And some more.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you write like this,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then it will come as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Keeping all the spaces intact,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: keeping all the new lines intact.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But it is not that tags will show up here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: For tags, we will have to use entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So this happens in pre tag HTML.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So we have seen entities,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: we have seen pre tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you want to put a copyright symbol,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then you can write ampersand copy semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And as you write ampersand copy semicolon here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then you will get to see the copyright symbol here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So you can do such things with the help of HTML entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So you have to try out all these examples.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Non-breaking spaces.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Along with that,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: you can use special symbols.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Like we saw copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: ampersand nbsp is used for space.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And it is very important.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So if I write here copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I write here copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And suppose I want for some reason,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: after seeing a lot of spaces here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And I write here code with Harry.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So if I write copyright code with Harry,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then this space will be considered as a fake space.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Because the extra spaces in HTML are ignored.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So if you see here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then the code with Harry came immediately after the copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But ideally we don't want that.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: What do we want?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: We want that the spaces that I have put,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: they come.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So don't put spaces.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: You put ampersand nbsp.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: The more you put ampersand nbsp,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: the more spaces will come.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: You see here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: These spaces are coming.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So whenever you want to put space in your HTML code,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: ampersand nbsp is something you should go after.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So here how to put these breaking spaces.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And along with that,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: the reserved characters in HTML,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: like less than, greater than,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: you can do all this with HTML entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: After this, what is quotation tag?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Quotation tag helps you write quotation in this way.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you the example of quotation tag here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So the quotation tag works like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And as soon as you write,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: here is the quotation text.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So what will happen?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: The search engines will know that you are actually writing a quotation.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And you can also style it with CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Then here if you want to cite anything,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: you can put its URL.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Similarly, you can also use the Q tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Site is equal to.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Put the URL here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So if you want to cite any research article,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: or there can be other reasons.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you want to cite Wikipedia,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then this tag is used.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And you can style it.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Obviously with the help of CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So these are our quotation tags.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And HTML entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Then there are some HTML tags that have become obsolete.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Like the font tag has become obsolete.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Because now with the help of CSS,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: we handle the font.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: We don't use font tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: There were many attributes in font.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Like color, size.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And in this way, you can use font tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But it's not recommended that you use font tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Then center tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: It was helpful in centering things.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But now I will recommend you that we will center with CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Flexbox Grid etc.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: The modern CSS will learn.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So all these tags are those.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: About which you should know.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But you should also know that you don't have to use them.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I hope that helps.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Then code tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: The most important tag for coders.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Like you are seeing this website here.

chunks.text: Codevitary.com.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Here you are seeing that I have used the code tag here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And if you are very excited about this thing.

chunks.text: Then I will tell you that I am using a library called Prism CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Many people ask me.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And I will tell you how to do all these things.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Prism JS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Prism JS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Prism.js.

chunks.text: What happens with this is that your code is highlighted.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: In this way, you can put code in your blog etc.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So I am using this library.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you how to do everything.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So don't worry at all.

chunks.text: But if you want to write code in this way.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: You have to use the code tag.

chunks.text: Then you will see that any code is written.

chunks.text: It is written in the code tag in the pre.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: See I have put pre.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you look below.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So if you get any kind of code on my site.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Then it will be in the code tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So let's say I want to write a code here.

chunks.text: And let's say I want to write a Python code here.
